DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE "APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ( "EQUIPMENT_TYPE" VARCHAR2(15 CHAR) VISIBLE NOT NULL, "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(40 CHAR) VISIBLE, "WEIGHT_KG" NUMBER(18,3) VISIBLE DEFAULT 0.000, "ENABLED" VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) VISIBLE DEFAULT 'Y' ) LOGGING NOCOMPRESS PCTFREE 10 INITRANS 1 STORAGE ( BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT ) PARALLEL 1 NOCACHE DISABLE ROW MOVEMENT
ALTER TABLE "APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ADD CONSTRAINT "APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("EQUIPMENT_TYPE")
ALTER TABLE "APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ADD CONSTRAINT "EQUIPMENT_TYPE_NOT_NULL" CHECK ("EQUIPMENT_TYPE" IS NOT NULL) NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE NORELY VALIDATE

CREATE TABLE "APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ( "DESPATCH_NO" VARCHAR2(18 CHAR) VISIBLE NOT NULL, "EQUIPMENT_TYPE" VARCHAR2(15 CHAR) VISIBLE NOT NULL, "QUANTITY" NUMBER VISIBLE DEFAULT 0 ) LOGGING NOCOMPRESS PCTFREE 10 INITRANS 1 STORAGE ( BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT ) PARALLEL 1 NOCACHE DISABLE ROW MOVEMENT
ALTER TABLE "APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ADD CONSTRAINT "APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("DESPATCH_NO", "EQUIPMENT_TYPE")
ALTER TABLE "APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ADD CONSTRAINT "DESPATCH_NO_NOT_NULL" CHECK ("DESPATCH_NO" IS NOT NULL) NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE NORELY VALIDATE
ALTER TABLE "APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE" ADD CONSTRAINT "EQUIPMENT_TYPE_NOT_NULL2" CHECK ("EQUIPMENT_TYPE" IS NOT NULL) NOT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE NORELY VALIDATE
ALTER TABLE "APP_DESPATCH" ADD ("TOTAL_EQUIPMENT" NUMBER DEFAULT 0)
ALTER TABLE "APP_PALLET" ADD ("EQUIPMENT_TYPE" VARCHAR2(15) DEFAULT '')
ALTER TABLE "APP_PALLET_HISTORY" ADD ("EQUIPMENT_TYPE" VARCHAR2(15) DEFAULT '')

UPDATE APP_PALLET t1 SET ( EQUIPMENT_TYPE ) = (SELECT t2.EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL t2 WHERE t1.MATERIAL = t2.MATERIAL ) WHERE t1.EQUIPMENT_TYPE IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM APP_MATERIAL t2 WHERE t1.MATERIAL = t2.MATERIAL AND t2.EQUIPMENT_TYPE IS NOT NULL)

UPDATE APP_PALLET_HISTORY t1 SET ( EQUIPMENT_TYPE ) = (SELECT t2.EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL t2 WHERE t1.MATERIAL = t2.MATERIAL ) WHERE t1.EQUIPMENT_TYPE IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM APP_MATERIAL t2 WHERE t1.MATERIAL = t2.MATERIAL AND t2.EQUIPMENT_TYPE IS NOT NULL)

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "view_pallet_expiry" AS ( SELECT P."SSCC", P."LOCATION_ID", P."MATERIAL", P."BATCH_NUMBER", P."PROCESS_ORDER", P."QUANTITY", P."UOM", P."DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE", P."STATUS", P."EAN", P."VARIANT", P."DESPATCH_NO", P."CONFIRMED", P."LAYERS", P."SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE", P."CUSTOMER_ID", P."MHN_NUMBER", P."DECISION", B.EXPIRY_DATE, M.DESCRIPTION, M.OLD_MATERIAL, C.CUSTOMER_NAME, C.PRINT_ON_LABEL, p.DATE_CREATED, P.CREATED_BY_USER_ID, P.DATE_UPDATED, P.UPDATED_BY_USER_ID, P.EQUIPMENT_TYPE, M.GROSS_WEIGHT, M.NET_WEIGHT, M.WEIGHT_UOM, D.DATA AS PART_NO, E.DATA AS CASE_CONTENT, O.REQUIRED_RESOURCE AS REQUIRED_RESOURCE FROM APP_PALLET P LEFT JOIN APP_MATERIAL_BATCH B ON ( P.MATERIAL = B.MATERIAL AND P.BATCH_NUMBER = B.BATCH_NUMBER ) LEFT JOIN APP_MATERIAL M ON P.MATERIAL = M.MATERIAL LEFT JOIN APP_CUSTOMER C ON P.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER O ON P.PROCESS_ORDER = O.PROCESS_ORDER LEFT JOIN APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA D ON ( D.MATERIAL = P.MATERIAL AND D.CUSTOMER_ID = P.CUSTOMER_ID AND D.DATA_ID = 'PART_NO' ) LEFT JOIN APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA E ON ( E.MATERIAL = P.MATERIAL AND E.CUSTOMER_ID = P.CUSTOMER_ID AND E.DATA_ID = 'CASE_CONTENT' ) )

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "view_pallet_history" AS ( SELECT "TRANSACTION_REF", "TRANSACTION_TYPE", "TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE", "TRANSACTION_DATE", "SSCC", "LOCATION_ID", "MATERIAL", "BATCH_NUMBER", "PROCESS_ORDER", "QUANTITY", "UOM", "DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE", "STATUS", "EAN", "VARIANT", "DESPATCH_NO", "USER_ID", "CONFIRMED", "LAYERS", "SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE", "CUSTOMER_ID", "MHN_NUMBER", "DECISION" , "EQUIPMENT_TYPE" FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY )

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW "view_pallet_history_expiry" AS ( SELECT p."TRANSACTION_REF", p."TRANSACTION_TYPE", p."TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE", p."TRANSACTION_DATE", p."SSCC", p."LOCATION_ID", p."MATERIAL", p."BATCH_NUMBER", p."PROCESS_ORDER", p."QUANTITY", p."UOM", p."DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE", p."STATUS", p."EAN", p."VARIANT", p."DESPATCH_NO", p."USER_ID", p."CONFIRMED", p."LAYERS", p."SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE", p."CUSTOMER_ID", p."MHN_NUMBER", p."DECISION", p."EQUIPMENT_TYPE", b.EXPIRY_DATE, m.DESCRIPTION FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY p, APP_MATERIAL_BATCH b, APP_MATERIAL m WHERE b.material = p.material AND b.batch_number = p.batch_number AND m.material = p.material )
